description: A list of Serviceability Response resources with additional meta information.
title: serviceabilityResponseList

$eref.description: Specifies relationships between the current document and an external resource.
$eref.title: link

___href.description: A URL. Specifies the location of the linked document.

___type.description: Specifies the media type of the linked document.

___title.description: Provide additional / advisory information (expand on the meaning of the link).

___method.description: Specifies how to send the data (e.g. get, post).

___rel.description: Specifies the relationship between the current document and the linked document.

___link.description: A self referencing link to the collection.

___serviceabilityResponses.description: An array for Serviceability Response items.

$eref.description: A response provided by an organization (Seller) to a Serviceability Request made by another organization (Buyer). This Serviceability Response is for a single location.
$eref.title: serviceabilityResponse

___buyerProjectId.description: The project's unique identifier for the buyer project.  An identifier that is used to group Orders that represent a unit of functionality that is important to a buyer. A project can be used to relate multiple orders together.

___status.description: The states used to convey Serviceability Response Status. Values are: {DRAFT, UNDER_REVIEW, RESPONSE_SUBMITTED, ACCEPTED, COMPLETE, REJECTED}.

___expirationDate.description: The date the Serviceability Response expires, formatted as  YYYY-MM-DD (eg 1997-07-16) or YYYY-MM-DDThh:mmTZD (eg 1997-07-16T19:20+01:00).

___installationInterval.description: An estimate of the number of calendar days until the desired service could be activated.

___createdAt.description: The date object was created formatted as  YYYY-MM-DD (eg 1997-07-16) or YYYY-MM-DDThh:mmTZD (eg 1997-07-16T19:20+01:00).

___serviceabilityRequestId.description: The id of the associated Serviceability Request.

___serviceDetail.description: A response to the serviceability request that contains information about one or more Product Specifications that can be ordered to realize the desired service.

___updatedAt.description: The date object was last upldated formatted as  YYYY-MM-DD (eg 1997-07-16) or YYYY-MM-DDThh:mmTZD (eg 1997-07-16T19:20+01:00).

___orderDependent.description: Indicates if a servie site inventoty update sould be made based on the SRP once an Order has been placed using this SRP.

___sellerProjectId.description: The project's unique identifier for a seller project.  An identifier that is used to group Orders that represent a unit of functionality that is important to a buyer. A project can be used to relate multiple orders together.

___sellerId.description: An organization that provides products and services to a buyer. Specifically, the ID of the Partner/Access Provider (Seller) organization receiving the serviceability request.

___accepted.description: Indicates if Serviceability Request is accepted. If accepted is true, this indicates the Serviceability Request is accepted.

___perfectMatch.description: Indicates that this response matches exactly the details on the associated serviceability request. This can be useful in differentiating serviceability responses that are upsell or alternatives to the original request.

___buyerId.description: A Party Role played by an Individual or an Organization that buys products and services from a Seller. Specifically, the ID of the Service Provider (Buyer) organization placing the serviceability request.

___objectType.description: The type of the object, serviceabilityResponse.

___mpoeOnly.description: Indicates if access to the location is currenly Minimum Point Of Entry (MPOE) only. If mpoeOnly is true, this indicates that full access to the location (e.g. sub-unit or suite) has not yet been established. If mpoeOnly is false or not defined, this indicates that full access to the location has been (or will be) established.

___buyerSiteId.description: The Projects Site this SRP belongs to

___siteListId.description: The Projects Site List this SRP belongs to

___serviceSiteInformation.description: The service site information for the serviceability request.

___confidence.description: Serviceability confidence from seller for this request.

___returned.description: The number of items returned for this collection.

___available.description: The number of items available for this collection.
